passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(18) > main:nth-child(2) > div > h1:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(18) > main:nth-child(2) > div > form:nth-child(2) > fieldset:nth-child(3) > header:nth-child(2) > h2
html > body > div:nth-child(18) > footer:nth-child(7) > nav:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(18) > footer:nth-child(7) > nav:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(18) > footer:nth-child(7) > nav:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(3) > h3:nth-child(1)
